INSTALL

This document covers installing APT from the binary releases.

Note that multiple versions of APT can be installed and used simultaneously. The the various manuals for more information on using APT command line programs.

MS Windows Systems

  • Download the windows installer
  • Run the installer
  • From the start menu, run the APT Command Prompt

*NIX Systems

  • Download the respective binary zip file
  • Unzip the binary distribution in a convenient location
  • Add the bin sub folder to your PATH

Affymetrix Power Tools (APT) Release 1.18.0
